In case it wasn't mentioned, we are currently at

7

and counting.

I can't bring myself to go ahead with my Jool 5 mission with 1.0 so close. Especially since I have yet to simulate a single successful Tylo landing with the lander. I thought I could pull it off with 5100 m/s and about 1.7 TWR, but no luck.

Anyway, maybe I'll try and build a modular spaceplane/Mun lander as my last project in 0.90. (Wanders off toward SPH, lost in thought.)

Happy landings!

You guys are so funny. I bought this game for 20 freaking dollars shortly after the .18 version and every time they released an update I play it like crazy as if it's a new game. How on earth can you be passionate enough to post 676 times in a games forum and (most likely absolutely love the game) give it a bad review for any reason? I would most definitely rate it a 10 just based on previous experience, regardless of how 1.0 plays. It's creative, challenging, incredibly unique and overall a wonderful experience, not to mention the most educational game I have ever played. I would have given .18 a 10/10, so 1.0 should probably get around a 34/10.

Plus NEW FREAKING AERO!!! Bring the Hype!

Hype! Hype! Ohhh.... So Much HYPE! 

I simply am having a hard time waiting.

Do you like knowing your opinion makes no difference? Well giving KSP a bad review is a good way of doing that. It's like the 6th best rated game ever made - and do you think people are going to suddenly start giving bad reviews at 1.0?

I hope you continue your belief of giving a solid bad review to any game released with *any* bugs - because you must hate every single game.

{shrugs} 1.0, 0.9, 0.38 .. does it really matter that much? This is going to be an \*awesome\* update. And if there are a few bugs? Well, it is a .0 release. There will be a 1.1 - and there will be much more still to come. This game is already topping the top five games I have sunk the majority of my life into. I will praise Squad from the tallest tower, because they have made something truly awesome. 

The \*really\* funny thing about this release to me: I'm on a 3 week holiday right now. The day I go back to work? The day after 1.0 is due for release. With time-zone differences, I probably go back to work the very day this releases. ..This feels like Shatner's "Khaaaaaaaaan!!!" moment. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
